titleStmt.title: William Godwin's Diary
titleStmt.author: William Godwin
titleStmt.funder: Leverhulme Foundation and the John Fell OUP Research Fund

publicationStmt.authority: Published by the Godwin Diary Project, University of Oxford

revisionDesc.change: Dr James Cummings generated this file.

div.ab: 1825, Jan. 1. Sa. Commonwealth, p. 357.

Jan. 2. Su. Commonwealth, 12 lines, & çala. Call on
Booth twice : N G calls: call on John Evans
.

3. M. Commonwealth, p. 358. Call on Newton, painter
, & Macgowan : H M & Wsup.

4. Tu. Commonwealth, 11 lines , & çala. Call on Hume
,
Baldwin
&
Cradock
: dine at M W S’s ; adv. Hogg, mrs Williams, M& W
.

5. W. Commonwealth, p. 359/2. B Combe , Rowbothams & John Evans call: call on Cradock
&
Saunders
: A Harwood dines: theatre, Fatal Dowry.

6. Th. Call on Keane
,
Isa. Booth
,
Booth
,
Jo G
,
Joshua Evans
n & Jno Evans: seek .

7. F. Fatal Dowry, çala. Call on Sturmy
: Keanes & Were call: M W S dines; adv. W & Booth
.

8. Sa. Commonwealth, p. 360. Call on
Joshua Evans
&
Gresham
: miss Collins dines.
Jan. 9. Su. Commonwealth, p. 361/2. Dine at White’s (Isleworth), w. Buxton, son, & 2 daughters .

10. M. Write to Joshua Evans & Gresham . Call on Macgowan
, & Phillips, Swithin’s Lane
. Marriage, p. 139. 2 livres .

11. Tu. Commonwealth, p. 362/2. Marriage, p. 200. Write to Stewart . Call on Bryant
.

12. W. Commonwealth, p. 364/2. Marriage, p. 257. M W S &W dine; adv.H Prentis, & White, Isleworth
.
13. Th. Commonwealth, p. 366/2: read to M J &M W S . Write to Stewart . Macmillan calls. Marriage, p. 319.
14. F. Commonwealth, p. 366. Museum; Scots’ Peerage : theatre, 3/10 Merry Wives.

15. Sa. Commonwealth, çala. Macgowan calls: call John Evans
.

Jan. 16. Su. Commonwealth, çala.Marriage, Vol. II, p. 100. Dine at Bryant’s
.

17. M. Commonwealth, p. 367/2. Marriage, p. 314. Call on Booth
n &
T Rodd
. Write to L C Lamb & Heurtley .

18. Tu. Commonwealth, p. 367. Booth at tea: sup at
Aldis’s , w. Davieses, Keirs, Deacons, Uwinses, &c.

19. W. Commonwealth, p. 369/2. Call on Northcote
: theatre, Fall of Algiers; adv. Barhams & Keirs
.

20. Th. Write to Stewart, on pacquet . Bandello, p. 231 to 250. M W S & W dine; adv.H P
. Call on Curtis
.
21. F. Commonwealth, p. 369. E Pilcher calls. Write to E Taylor.
22. Sa. Commonwealth, 7 lines. Marriage, Vol. III, p. 100. Miss Hippisley calls.

Jan. 23. Su. Commonwealth, çala. Marriage, p. 250. Meet Davison : call on Booth ; adv. R Baxter
: E Pilcher at tea.

24. M. Commonwealth, çala. Write to Stewart, 3 times:Letter from Cumming : M W S dines; adv. W
.

25. Tu. Commonwealth, 12 lines. Write to Stewart . Marriage, p. 343, fin. Call on Booth
: theatre, 1/5 As You Like It.

26. W.
Stewart calls: call on Baldwin
&
Sherwood
: M W S dines; adv. W
.

27. Th. Commonwealth, p. 371. Call on Pouncy
&
Rodd
: meet Hume : Blackmore calls: Booth at tea.

28. F. Commonwealth, p. 372/2. Call on Gledstanes
& Jo G , & on Davison
.

29. Sa. Commonwealth, çala. Call on Lubé
: Hudsons & mrs Hazlit at tea.

Jan. 30. Su. Commonwealth; çala. Call on Booth (adv. Rowbotham ), &
Jas Bacon
: Booth’s, au soir.

31. M. Commonwealth, çala. Dine at M W S’s , w. W; adv. mrs Williams : theatre, Overeach, act 5; adv. Barham & Thelwal
.

Feb. 1. Tu. Call on R Hunter (adv. Nichols ) &
Barber
: Booth at tea.

2. W. Hubert, Tragedy. Call on Baldwin
,
Cradock
,
Booth
&
Were
: seek Davison .

3. Th. Commonwealth, çala. Call on Macgowan
,
Were
,
Barber
, &
O Rees
; adv. S R Phillips : meet E White : W dines. Parliament meets.

4. F. Commonwealth, p. 372. M W S dines; adv.W, & H Prentis n
: theatre, Macbeth, act 5. Snow. Fire.

5. Sa. Commonwealth, p. 373, & 1/2 page. Call on Pouncy
,
Barber
, &
Booth
: seek Faithful .

Feb. 6. Su. Commonwealth, p. 374/2. Gamba, passim. Call on Bryant
: Booth’s, au soir.

7. M. Commonwealth, çala. Call on R Taylor
:
theatre, w. M J & M W S, Macbeth .

8. Tu. Commonwealth, çala. Write to Hume : Jno Evans & Aldis call: call on
Macgowan
: meet Knowles : theatre, Belle’s Stratagem; adv. Barham
.

9. W. Write to Fellowes . Call on Pouncy
, &
J Taylor
; adv. West junr
: M W S dines; adv. H & S Prentis & H P
.

10. Th. Commonwealth, çala. Call on Helder
, &
Lemon (adv. Sec. Peele ): Raffaele Tapestries: Hudson dines: theatre, Native Land, act 2.

11. F. Commonwealth, p. 374. Helder & Macgowan call: call on Booth
. Bandello, p. 304.

12. Sa. Commonwealth, p. 377/2. Call on Baldwin
.

Feb. 14. Su. Commonwealth, p. 378. Call on Booth
: N G calls. au soir.

14. M. Commonwealth, çala. Write to P H G . Call on Pouncy
, &
Baldwin
: seek Davison : Jno Evans calls .
15. Tu. Commonwealth, p. 379. Write to Jo G . Macmillan calls.

16. W. Commonwealth, p. 381. Call on Booth ; adv. Allen
: M W S dines; adv. W
.

17. Th. Commonwealth, p. 382/2: Call on Pouncy
&
Gledstanes
: theatre, Massaniello; adv. Barham
.
18. F. Commonwealth, çala. Museum; Petition, Dec. 1646 . Accounts.

19. Sa. Accounts. Call on Booth
: theatre, 3/5 Inconstant; adv. Wallace & Sheil
.

Feb. 20. Su. Commonwealth, 1647, çala. Call on John Evans
: Booth’s, au soir.

21. M. Accounts. Call on Booth
: theatre, Richard, acts 1 & 2/2.

22. Tu. Write to Baldwin . Call on Booth
&
Baldwin
: Curtis , mrs Hippesley & John Evans call.
Trial for Use & Occupation .

23. W. Letter to T T . Call on Baldwin
na &
Davison
: M W S dines. Macmillan calls.

24. Th. Call on Gledstanes
,
Were
&
Booth
: M dines. Miss Hippesley calls n . Booth calls on Macgowan .

25. F. Call on Baldwin (adv. Helder ), &
Booth
: Macgowan calls: call on Macgowan
.

26. Sa. Call on Pouncy
,
Nashes
, &
Willats
: seek Booth : M & H P call:
theatre, Othello, w.M W S, mrs Williams & Gamba
. Write to T T .

Su. Feb. 27. Commonwealth, p. 382. H P & W dine; adv. M
: N G calls: Booth’s, au soir.

28. M. Call on Pouncy
,
Rogers
,
Gledstanes
&
Sturmy
: seek Miles , Davison & Agar : H P calls: theatre, Father & Son; adv. Barhams
.

Mar. 1. Tu. Commonwealth, 383. Meet H P, at Booth’s
: Hudson at tea. Write to W G, Enfield Highway . Letter fr. Rogers
. Catholic Emancipation voted 247 to 234.

2. W. Commonwealth, 9 lines. Seek Miles , Key & Faithful : call on Hebard
,
Manning
,
Barber
,
Booth
&
Regulus
: M W S & Hudson dine; adv.M & H P
.

3. Th. Seek Miles & Phillips : call on Booth
, Boycot (Rogers’s),
Beadnel
,
Blackmore
&
Agar
: theatre, Maria Darlington.

4. F. Call on Stevenson
&
Salt
,
Barber
&
Booth
: Hume dines. Letter to Booth .
5. Sa. Commonwealth, p. 384. & 1 page. Write to Booth . M calls: M W S dines.

Mar. 6. Su. Commonwealth, p. 385/2. M calls: call on Booth , w. do
: N G calls.
Dr Parr dies.

7. M. Commonwealth, p. 385. Call on Booth
. Write to T T .
Theatre, w. M W S & A Gliddon, Richard.

8. Tu. Commonwealth, p. 386. Write to W G,Enfield Highway . Call on Booth
: Mcalls, au soir.

9. W. Commonwealth, p. 388/2. M W S, & M(from Davison ) dine: call on Isa. Booth , w. M .
Mrs Barbauld dies.

10. Th. Commonwealth, p. 389. Call on Booth
.
11. F. Commonwealth, p. 390/2. M calls.

12. Sa. Commonwealth, p. 391/2. Beddoes & Mcall: call on Booth
.

Mar. 13. Su. Commonwealth, p. 392. N G calls: Booth’s, au soir: call on Jo G
.

14. M. Commonwealth, p. 394. Call on Northcote ; adv. mrs Jas Moore & miss Cruickshank
: Hudson dines. Macmillan calls na & M .

15. Tu. Commonwealth, p. 395. Theatre, 1/2 Lumpkin; adv. Barhams, Poole & Wallace
: L Kenney & T Htcall.
16. W. Commonwealth, p. 396. Davison na , Macmillan na , & M call: M W S dines: Booth’s, au soir.

17. Th. Commonwealth, p. 397/2. Call on Booth
: Macmillan calls na .
18. F. Commonwealth, p. 399/2. Macmillan na , Stewart, 3 times na , G Greenhill , M & miss Hippisley call.

19. Sa.
M breakfasts: Guildhall; adv. Davison & B Montagu . Write to Hume , Macmillan , Curtis , & R Taylor . Calls (A M), Stewart na & Macmillan na ; (P M) Hume na , Greenhill & M Jones : soir, call on Booth .

Mar. 20. Su. Commonwealth, p. 399. M W S dines; adv. N G
.

21. M. Write to Mackintosh , Ayrton , Jas White , Jo G & P H G . Hume , Booth & M Lamb call: M W S & Hudson at tea; adv. P P
: meet Wallace : call on Isa. Booth
.

22. Tu. Commonwealth, çala. Langdon expected. Call on
Booth
: M calls. Bandello, p. 354.

23. W. Commonwealth, çala. Langdon junr ; adv. Booth
: Jno Evans calls na : call on do
. Letter to Wedgwood .

24. Th. Commonwealth, p. 401. Write to Wedgwood . Greenhill & M call: M W S dines; adv. Lambs
.

25. F. Commonwealth, p. 402/2. Bandello, p. 386. Greenhill & Langdon call: call on Booth
.

26. Sa. Guildhall; Greenhill , Hume , & Brown (Longman): M calls, & Jno Evans na :
theatre, w. M W S, Othello .

Mar. 27. Su. Commonwealth, p. 404/2. Call on Bryant
,
John Evans
, &
Booth
; adv. R Baxter : N G calls.

28. M. Commonwealth, p. 405. Bandello, p. 421. L Kenney & T Ht call: call on
Jo G
.

29. Tu. Commonwealth, p. 407. Bandello, Vol. IV, p. 24. Call on Greenhill
&
Booth
.

30. W. Commonwealth, p. 409. Greenhill & M call: M W S dines; adv. A Harwood & M
.
31. Th. Commonwealth, p. 411/2. Hume calls: Langdon dines. Belzoni’s Tomb (adv. Bentham ), & Martin’s Creation .

Apr. 1. F. Commonwealth, 15 lines. Call, w. M J, onEllen Ht . M calls n, from Macmillan
.

2. Sa. Commonwealth, p. 412. Bandello, p. 77. Call on Booth
.
Apr. 3. Su. Commonwealth, p. 413. Bandello, p. 96. Sup at Lamb’s , w. mr & mrs Payne, & W . N G calls n . Easter.

4. M. Commonwealth, p. 414. Call on Greenhill
: dine at M W S’s , w. Gisborne’s .

5. Tu. Guildhall; Greenhill , Hume , Macmillan , Curtis , Bonsor , R Taylor , Davison , Scatcherd , Prince , & 3 Reads : meet H Rodd : call on T Rodd
.

6. W. Commonwealth, çala. State Paper office.
Greenhill calls: M W S dines; adv. E Collins & W
.

7. Th.
Macmillan calls na : meet do
:
theatre, w.W, Matthews, Memorandums .

8. F.
State Paper Office . John Evans call: theatre, Hebrew Family.
9. Sa. Commonwealth, çala. M calls: Booth dines.

Apr. 10. Su. Commonwealth, çala. Accounts, w. Lammin
.

11. M. Commonwealth, çala. Call on Booth
x &
Greenhill
: Davison calls n : M dines: theatre, Fatal Dowry; adv. sir R Phillips & Gent . x Adv. Macgowan .
12. Tu. Accounts. Museum . Davison & M call, & miss Hippesley n .

13. W. Accounts. Bandello, p. 128.
Booth’s, au soir. M W S dines; adv. W, & Stephen Prentis
.

14. Th.
Greenhill & Macmillan call: call on Davison
&
Greenhill
: M calls: London Institution, 1647: A Harwood sups.

15. F.
State Paper Office . Davison , Macmillan & Stephens (Library) , M n & Upcot call:meet Hill : Pilcher & P P at tea: call on Booth
.

16. Sa. Commonwealth, çala. Bandello, p. 204 to 232. M calls.
Fuseli dies.

Apr. 17. Su. Commonwealth, 1 page.A Sidney, çala. Call on John Evans
.
18. M. Commonwealth, 1 page. Bandello, p. 256. Mcalls: theatre, 1/2 Macbeth.

19. Tu. Bandello, p. 313. M & Macmillan call: call on Knowles
n ,
Macmillan
&
Davison
.

20. W. Write to P H G . Call on Knowles
: Macmillan calls: theatre, Orestes in Argos; adv. Bartley
. £60 .

21. Th. Commonwealth, 1 1/2 pp. Call on Booth
&
Greenhill
: M W S dines; adv. W.

22. F. Commonwealth, revise. Call on Macmillan , &
Booth
; adv. Baxter :
Duncan,accountant, au soir.

23. Sa. Call on Booth
:
Duncan, 1/2 after two : theatre, 1/2 School for Scandal.
Apr. 24. Su. Accounts. Booth’s, au soir.

25. M. Call on Booth
,
Northcote
n &
J Taylor
: meet Black : H M dines.

26. Tu.
Knowles , & C Kemble call, & M : call on Booth twice , &
Greenhill
: A Harwood calls.

27. W.
Call on Booth , morn & even : M W S dines. Davison calls n, w. Jackson .

28. Th. Call on Booth
: Kenney calls: Duncan sups, 6th day.

29. F.
Greenhill calls twice & M : call on Booth
: theatre, Lofty Projects.

30. Sa. Guildhall; Macmillan , Greenhill , Duncan , Hume , Reads , E Taylor , Pouncy , Macgowan , Whitaker , Sturmy & Hawes : call on Davison
&
Macmillan
: M W S & M dine.
May 1. Su. Bandello, Vol. IV, p. 54. Memorial for G K Davison . M & N G call. Constip, 4 days.

2. M. Write to T T , & White, Isleworth
. G White , Uwins , Duncan , Greenhill & Kenneycall : call on Davison
&
T Rodd
.

3. Tu. Life of Kemble, p. 250. Exhibition: theatre, Tribulation; adv. J Taylor & Hill
.

4. W. Boaden, çala. White, Isleworth
, & M call: M W S dines; adv. miss Collins
: call on Booth
n .

5. Th. Boaden, Vol. II, p. 172: L Lincoln, p. 97. Greenhill , Hume & Aldis call: call on
Booth ; adv. Baxter
.

6. F. Boaden, p. 428. Lawless & Greenhill call: call on
Curtis
n; adv. Sturmy
: Hudson dines: Baxter & Isa. Bth call.

7. Sa. Commonwealth, çala. Boaden, fin: L Lincoln, p. 134. John Evans calls: Call on
Curtis
,
Greenhill
,
Macmillan
n , &
Bryant ; adv. fils
.

May 8. Su. Commonwealth, çala. L Lincoln, p. 319. Call on Davison
,
Macmillan
n &
Booth
.
9. M. Commonwealth, 7 lines. Duncan calls: sup at Lamb’s , w. M W S, mrs Williams, mrs Novello, H Payne, Moxon, Talfourd & Price .

10. Tu. Commonwealth, çala. Museum; Lawmind : M Jones calls: call on Davison
&
Macmillan
.

11. W. Commonwealth, çala. Call on Curtis
&
Greenhill
: Exhibition, & Artists, w. M W S
: dines :
theatre, Wm Tell; adv. Talfourd, Price, Barhams, Footes, & J Taylor ; w. M W S .
12. Th. Rain. Commonwealth, çala. L Lincoln, Vol. II, p. 240. M calls.

13. F. Commonwealth, çala. Museum; Lawmind.L Lincoln, p. 300 . Call on Orme
,
Scatcherd
n , & Greenhill : theatre, W Tell, acts 2, 3, 4.

14. Sa. Commonwealth, p. 415/2. Write to Taylor, Norwich
. Call on Knowles
: M W S at tea. L Lincoln, p. 2. Vol. III.

May 15. Su. Commonwealth, p. 417/2. Call on Booth (adv. Rowbotham ), &
Jo G ; adv.N G
.

16. M. Commonwealth, p. 418. Bandello, p. 90. Call on Macgowan
n : theatre, Faustus; adv. J Taylor & Barham & Talfourd
.

17. Tu. Commonwealth, p. 420/2. Call on Helling
, &
Mcgowan
n , &
Booth
: Dyers call.

ab.emph: Catholic Bill rejected by Lords, 178 to 130.

div.ab:
18. W. Commonwealth, p. 422. Bandello, p. 138. Call on Macgowan
, &
Pouncy
n .

19. Th. Commonwealth, p. 424. Call on Pouncy
,
R Taylor
n &
Greenhill
: M W S dines; adv. W
.

20. F. Commonwealth, p. 426. Hadlow Street & Gower Place, w. M J : theatre, 1/2 Kitely; adv. Davison jun
.

21. Sa. Commonwealth, çala. Call on Osborne
,
Kemp
&
mrs Handley
: M W S dines. Bandello, p. 170.

May 22. Su. Commonwealth, p. 428/2. N G calls: call on
Booth
.

23. M. Commonwealth, çala. Call on R Hunter
,
R Taylor
,
Handley
n , &
Greenhill
; adv. Jackson : M calls: theatre, 7/10 J Cæsar.

24. Tu. Commonwealth, çala. Call on Hanley
n : Grayson & M call: call on mrs Osborne , w.M J .

25. W. Commonwealth, p. 429/2. Bandello, p. 254. Call on Bonsor
,
R Taylor
n , &
Jo G
: Greenhill calls: M W S dines. Call on
Howard Payne
.

26. Th. Commonwealth, p. 429. Seek R Taylor : call on Bain
: Osbornes call n : call on mrs Osborne
.

27. Deliquium. Commonwealth, p. 430. Call on R Taylor
n ,
Booth
,
Davison
n , &
Macgowan
: R Taylor calls na , & Greenhill .

28. Sa. Commonwealth, çala. Bandello, p. 336.
Greenhill , w. Macmillan, calls:

Grayson calls, sign : call on Booth
.

May 29. Su. Bandello, p. 356. Call on Osborne
,
Davison ( 3 times)
n ,
Macmillan
&
H P
: Howard Payne calls.

30. M. Call on Davison
&
H Robinson (pay)
: Howard Payne in Gower Place : M W S dines: sleep in Gower Place .

31. Tu.
Greenhill , & Jackson & femme call: call on Booth
{.} Leave St Clement’s .
George Chalmers dies.

June 1. W. Wait for carpenter for shelves: shelves begun, 4 o’clock.
M calls: M W S dines.

2. Th. Arrange. Call on Booth
, &
Macgowan
n .

3. F. Arrange.
Hanley
&
Grayson call: dine [not?] at M W S’s .

4. Sa. Void a large worm. Arrange. Call on Macgowan
,
T Rodd
,
Sidney
&
Bain
: M calls.

June 5. Su. Arrange. Dine at M W S’s ; adv. Lefanu
.
6. M. Arrange. Bandello, p. 376. M W S calls: theatre, Beggar’s Opera. Meet Northcote .
Hot weather, 11 days.

7. Tu. Arrange. Call on Hawes
&
Greenhill
. Seek (Darton &) Harvey .

8. W. Arrange. Seek Haselwood : call on Northcote
: M W S dines.

9. Th. Arrange. Call on Orme
: Lubé , White n (Isleworth) , & M W S call.
Dr Rees dies.

10. F. Arrange. Call on H Robinson
. Write to Mrs Jo. G, on funeral .
Jo G dies.

11. Sa. Write to P H G . Arrange. Call on Haselwood
. Meet Gisbornes .

June 12. Su. Arrange. Howard Payne dines; adv. N G
. Letter from Prison, Fleet.

13. M. Arrange. Call on Greenhill at the Master’s : Osborne calls na . call on M
n .
14. Tu. Prepare. Museum; Lawmind . M & Wau soir. Prince Tarquin.

15. W.
Museum; Lawmind . M W S dines; M & Northcote call. Painters , &c.
16. Th. Letter to T T . Meet Poole . Ines de Castro.

17. F.
Museum; Lawmind . Write to T T . Oronooko, p. 50. Theatre, Pigeons & Crows.

18. Sa. Oronooko, fin. Call on Rodd
, &
M W S
n . Browne. Letter to Friend.
June 19. Su. Commonwealth, 5 lines. Indisposed. Dine at M W S’s , w. M J & Howard Payne : N G calls n .

20. M. Commonwealth, 2 lines. Oracles of Reason, çala. Call on M W S
: N G & M call: meet Wilmot, in R Park .
21. Tu. Commonwealth, p. 431. Exhibition of Portraits, Leicester Square .

22. W. Commonwealth, çala. Call on Booth
: theatre, Overreach.
23. Th. Commonwealth, çala. M W S, W, & Howard Payne dine.

24. F. Commonwealth, seek J Lilburne: meet Lamb : call on M
n : M J for Rochester . Bandello, p. 414. 14 days.

25. Sa. Bed removed: arrange. M calls n : M W S at tea: call on
Carlisle
.

June 26. Su. Arrange. Hudson & M call: dine at
M W S’s ; adv. mrs Williams
.

27. M. Rhume. Write to M J . Bandello, p. 441. M dines: theatre, Brutus; adv. Barham
.
28. Tu. Commonwealth, çala. Bandello, Vol. VI, p. 38.

29. W.
Kenrick . Jas White calls:
M W S dines. Bandello, p. 78.

30. Th. Commonwealth, çala. Bandello, p. 114. Call on Hume
,
Knowles
&
H Payne
.

July 1. F. Commonwealth, çala. Bacon, Essays, 1 to 8. M W S & M call: dine at
Hudson’s
: call on Bryant
: theatre, 1/2 hour.

2. Sa. Commonwealth, çala. Crusaders, p. 58. dine at M W S’s
.
July 3. Su. Commonwealth, p. 432/2. Crusaders, p. 114. Dine at White, Isleworth , w. G White . T Ht calls, & N G n .

4. M. Commonwealth, p. 432. Write to M J. Bandello, p.153. Call on Uwins
n : theatre, Beggar’s Opera; adv.J Taylor & Curwood
: N G calls.

5. W. Commonwealth, çala. Call on Gisbornes
: theatre, Broken Promises; adv. Bacon, O’Hanlons, Barham (& R Martin) .
6. W. Commonwealth, çala. Bandello, p. 186. Uwins calls: M W S dines.

7. Th. Commonwealth, p. 433. Call on Lamb
n : N G calls: M W S &mrs Williams at tea. Signature of L Chancellor .
8. F. Commonwealth, p. 434. Howard Payne dines. M Jfrom Rochester .

9. Sa. Commonwealth, p. 436/2. M W S , & N G call: call on
Rodd
.

July 10. M.
Commonwealth, p. 437. Meet Mulready :dine at Hume’s
.

11. M. Commonwealth, p. 439/2. Dine at M W S’s , w. M J; adv. Lambs & H Payne
. Hot weather, 10 days.

12. Tu. Commonwealth, çala. Round Regent’s Park: call on
M
n .
13. W. Commonwealth, Lilburne. M calls: M W S dines.
14. Th. Commonwealth, p. 440/2: compare Berkeley & Ludlow. Generous Boy. Thermometer, 77.
15. F. Commonwealth, p. 443/2. M W S calls: meet Terry . Thermometer, 85.
16. Sa. Commonwealth, p. 445/2.Thermometer, 83.

July 17. Su. Commonwealth, p. 448. Bandello, p. 222. Meet H Payne : Augustus Street:
M& W sup. Thermometer, 82.
18. M. Commonwealth, p. 451/2. Bandello, p. 245. Miss Collins & W sup. Thermometer, 86
19. Tu. Commonwealth, p. 452. Bandello, p. 264. White (Isleworth) calls. Thermometer, 86

20. W. Commonwealth, p. 455/2. Crusaders, p. 222. Call on Booth
n : miss Hippesley calls. Thermometer, 83
21. Th. Commonwealth, p. 455. Crusaders, p. 252. M W S dines.
22. F. Commonwealth, p. 456. Crusaders, p. 325; Vol. II, p. 208.

23. Sa. Commonwealth, çala. Crusaders, p. 364. Diorama, w. M W S
.

July 24. Su. Commonwealth, p. 457. Cecilia, çala. T Ht call: call on
Booth ; adv. R Baxter
: N G & Wat tea.

25. M. Commonwealth, p. 459. Call on Northcote
. Bandello, p. 288.
26. Tu. Commonwealth, p. 460. M W S dines.

27. W. Commonwealth, p. 463/2.
Museum; Strype & Dugdale : call on Rodd, for Richardsonia : seek Setchel & Thorpe .

28. Th. Commonwealth, p. 464/2.
Museum; Case of the Army . M W S & W dine.
meet Mes Lobrot & Jones .
29. F. Commonwealth, çala. T T at tea: theatre, Quite Correct, act 1; adv. Colburn & J Taylor

30. Sa.
Cromwel recovered. Call on
L C Lamb (adv. La Cork , &c), &
Rodd
: Colburn & H P call.

Aug. 1. M. Commonwealth, p. 466/2. Call on Greenhill
& Mansion House : Museum; Lilburne : dine at M W S’s , w. M J; adv. mrs Williams (& Colburn invisib ) . Constip.
2. Tu. Commonwealth, çala. Museum; Lilburne . Theatre, Who’s at Home.
3. W. Lilburne retrograde. Museum; ditto .
4. Th. Commonwealth, 6 lines. Museum; Lilburne . Bandello, p. 308. Waller, Panegyric. M W S dines.

5. F. Commonwealth, p. 467/2.
Museum; Lilburne . Wordsworth, on Cha. I, p. 88.

6. Sa. Wordsworth, p. 248: Sidney papers, Blencowe, çala. Constip.
Lens dies.

Aug. 7. Su. Commonwealth, p. 469. Wordsworth, p. 312. N G at tea; adv. W
.

8. M. Commonwealth, p. 470. Museum; Lilburne . M calls: theatre, 1/2 J Buzzby; adv. J Taylor
. Wordsworth, p. 362.

Museum; Lilburne . Wordsworth, p. 413, fin.
10. W. Commonwealth, p. 471/2. W dines. Bandello, p. 374.

.

:

n . Petrarca, T. 6.

.

.

27. Sa. Commonwealth, p. 494/2. Bandello, p. 414. Theatre, 1/5 Tarare.

29. M. Commonwealth, p. 498.
30. Tu. Commonwealth, p. 501/2. Diarrhoea.

.

5. M. Commonwealth, çala. Theatre, Bashful Man; adv. H P & Gent
. 1648.

n ,

, &
Macgowan

.

10. Sa. Commonwealth, p. 512. Petrarca, Canzone 5. Sup at Reynolds’s , w. H & S Boaden .

.
